MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G72 postcode area of Cambuslang, affecting properties in Calder Grover and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out partial repairs to overhead line equipment and are continuing further repairs. We now expect your supply to be restored by 5am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:40am on 9th April
